text: Sérgio Paulo Rouanet (23 February 1934 – 3 July 2022) was a Brazilian politician, philosopher, essayist, and scholar. He was the Secretary of Culture between 1991 and 1992. Rouanet was a member of the Brazilian Academy of Letters from 1992 to his death. He was born in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Rouanet died from problems caused by Parkinson's disease on 3 July 2022, in Rio de Janeiro at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian philosophers Category:Brazilian academics Category:Brazilian essayists Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro
title: Sérgio Paulo Rouanet
